credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 241 x 70.2 cm (94 7/8 in. x 27 5/8 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk and gilt paper
Technique: plain compound satin with supplementary weft
description: Panel of cream-colored satin brocaded with multi-colored silk and gilt paper in a design of fans, floral sprays, butterflies and swirling lines. Fans have landscape details with flowering branches and a variety of birds.
name: Textile
